actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain home sites within the Chugach and Tongass National Forests, Alaska.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to convey specified lands within the Chugach and Tongass National Forest, Alaska, to the present occupants as homesites.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain home sites within the Chugach and Tongass National Forests, Alaska.
